HDG.FS.content: Aristotle asks what’s extant (seiend) in time?—this is a reduction, a temporal predetermination is operative > for Kant, time conceived in horizon of ob-jectivity, that which holds itself steady in constant flow of changing now > Heidegger explains how short-circuiting of meditation on time covred over meaning of being > “thinking must consequently attempt to further a new—non-metaphysical—way of thinking time [overcoming metaphysics], not governed, surreptitiously, by ontological presupposition of beinghood of time, which concentrates only on what presences
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Aristotle asks what’s extant (seiend) in time?—this is a reduction, a temporal predetermination is operative > for Kant, time conceived in horizon of ob-jectivity, that which holds itself steady in constant flow of changing now > Heidegger explains how short-circuiting of meditation on time covred over meaning of being > “thinking must consequently attempt to further a new—non-metaphysical—way of thinking time [overcoming metaphysics], not governed, surreptitiously, by ontological presupposition of beinghood of time, which concentrates only on what presences

HDG.FS.content: unified question: being as position (Setzung) converges w/ totality of self-evident presuppositions & this convergence nourishes modern technological thinking > this unity evident in Kant’s title Metaphysical Foundations of Natural Science
HDG.FS.linkedContent: unified question: being as position (Setzung) converges w/ totality of self-evident presuppositions & this convergence nourishes modern technological thinking > this unity evident in Kant’s title Metaphysical Foundations of Natural Science

HDG.EC.content: devastation concerns our own essence in a way we’re just beginning to presage (ahnen) [proximity to presupposition]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: devastation concerns our own essence in a way we’re just beginning to presage (ahnen) [proximity to presupposition]

HDG.OHF.content: [on demands for and against types of presuppositions: cries of anxiety in face of philosophy]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [on demands for and against types of presuppositions: cries of anxiety in face of philosophy]

HDG.OHF.content: [phenomenology beyond dialectic] dialectic directionless (richtungslos) when no Grundblick in direction of (auf) the subject matter (Sache), a rationality testing/proving itself by looking this way (i.e. not dialectically) [Heidegger uses rationality affirmatively here?] > all dialectic lives from table of others, Hegel: “this traditional material” (Plato, Aristotle) “extremely importance source, indeed a necessary condition [and] presupposition to be gratefully acknowledged” (Science of Logic) > dialectic is double-sidedly un-radical: 1) lives from hand to mouth 2) eloquent about readymade material
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [phenomenology beyond dialectic] dialectic directionless (richtungslos) when no Grundblick in direction of (auf) the subject matter (Sache), a rationality testing/proving itself by looking this way (i.e. not dialectically) [Heidegger uses rationality affirmatively here?] > all dialectic lives from table of others, Hegel: “this traditional material” (Plato, Aristotle) “extremely importance source, indeed a necessary condition [and] presupposition to be gratefully acknowledged” (Science of Logic) > dialectic is double-sidedly un-radical: 1) lives from hand to mouth 2) eloquent about readymade material

HDG.OHF.content: uncovering essential laws (Wesensgesetze entdecken)! “horrid wretchedness (grausende Elend) of such systematic seduction of our fellow human beings” > passing off presuppositions as harmless by means of formalizing rationalization, bringing them to Public as such
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: uncovering essential laws (Wesensgesetze entdecken)! “horrid wretchedness (grausende Elend) of such systematic seduction of our fellow human beings” > passing off presuppositions as harmless by means of formalizing rationalization, bringing them to Public as such
